column2: The Native Council government type includes most countries in the New World. Tribes are nomadic. Each County can only have one Tribal 'Holding', representing the entire local tribal population - the more empty Holding slots, the more powerful the Tribal Holding. Native Council rulers often have the 'Elective Gavelkind' Succession Law and cannot form Kingdoms or Empires unless they reform.
The viking explorer who discovered Greenland. He was a Norse explorer who founded the first Norse settlements in North America.
